00031    template <class BarePair, class LinkPotential>
00032    class CompensatedPair : public ParamComposite

00172    /* 
00173    * Constructor.
00174    */
00175    template <class BarePair, class LinkPotential>
00176    CompensatedPair<BarePair, LinkPotential>::CompensatedPair() 
00177     : maxPairCutoff_(0.0),
00178       temp_(0.0),
00179       mu_(0.0),
00180       activity_(0.0),
00181       beta_(0.0),
00182       className_("CompensatedPair")
00183    {
00184       className_ += "<";
00185       className_ += pair_.className();
00186       className_ += ",";
00187       className_ += link_.className();
00188       className_ += ">";
00189    }

00192    * Copy constructor.

00195    CompensatedPair<BarePair, LinkPotential>::CompensatedPair(BarePair barePot) 
00196     : maxPairCutoff_(0.0),
00197       pair_(barePot),
00198       temp_(0.0),
00199       mu_(0.0),      
00200       activity_(0.0),
00201       beta_(0.0)

00204    /* 
00205    * Read potential parameters from file.
00206    */  
00207    template <class BarePair, class LinkPotential>
00208    void CompensatedPair<BarePair, LinkPotential>::readParam(std::istream &in)
00209    {
00210       //readBegin(in, "CompensatedPair");
00211 
00212       std::string label;
00213       Begin* beginPtr = 0;
00214       End*   endPtr = 0;
00215 
00216       // Read bare pair potential
00217       //label = pair_.className();
00218       //label += "{";
00219       beginPtr = &addBegin(pair_.className().c_str());
00220       beginPtr->setIndent(*this);
00221       beginPtr->readParam(in);
00222       readParamComposite(in, pair_);
00223       endPtr = &addEnd();
00224       endPtr->setIndent(*this);
00225       endPtr->readParam(in);
00226 
00227       // Read bare link potential
00228       //label = link_.className();
00229       //label += "{";
00230       beginPtr = &addBegin(link_.className().c_str());
00231       beginPtr->setIndent(*this);
00232       beginPtr->readParam(in);
00233       readParamComposite(in, link_);
00234       endPtr = &addEnd();
00235       endPtr->setIndent(*this);
00236       endPtr->readParam(in);
00237 
00238       read<double>(in, "maxLinkLength", maxLinkLength_); 
00239       read<double>(in, "temperature", temp_);
00240       read<double>(in, "mu", mu_);
00241 
00242       beta_ = 1.0/temp_;
00243       activity_ = exp(mu_*beta_);
00244 
00245       maxLinkLengthSq_ = maxLinkLength_*maxLinkLength_;
00246       maxPairCutoff_ = maxLinkLength_;
00247       if (pair_.maxPairCutoff() > maxLinkLength_) {
00248          maxPairCutoff_ = pair_.maxPairCutoff();
00249       }
00250 
00251       //readEnd(in);
00252    }
00253    
00254    /* 
00255    * Set nAtomType
00256    */
00257    template <class BarePair, class LinkPotential>   
00258    void CompensatedPair<BarePair, LinkPotential>::setNAtomType(int nAtomType) 
00259    {  
00260       pair_.setNAtomType(nAtomType);
00261       link_.setNBondType(1);
00262    }

00264    /* 
00265    * SetEpsilon
00266    */
00267    template <class BarePair, class LinkPotential>   
00268    void CompensatedPair<BarePair, LinkPotential>::setEpsilon(int i, int j, double epsilon) 
00269    {  pair_.setEpsilon(i, j, epsilon); }

00272    /* 
00273    * Get maximum of pair cutoff distance, for all atom type pairs.
00274    */
00275    template <class BarePair, class LinkPotential>  
00276    double CompensatedPair<BarePair, LinkPotential>::maxPairCutoff() const
00277    { return maxPairCutoff_; }
00278 
00279 
00280    /* 
00281    * Calculate interaction energy for a pair, as function of squared distance.
00282    */
00283    template <class BarePair, class LinkPotential>
00284    inline double CompensatedPair<BarePair, LinkPotential>::energy(double rsq, int i, int j) const 
00285    {
00286         double total = pair_.energy(rsq, i, j);
00287         if (rsq < maxLinkLengthSq_) {
00288            total += activity_ * temp_ * exp(-beta_ * link_.energy(rsq, 0));
00289         }
00290         return total;
00291    }
00292  
00293   
00294    /* 
00295    * Calculate force/distance for a pair as function of squared distance.
00296    */
00297    template <class BarePair, class LinkPotential>
00298    inline double 
00299    CompensatedPair<BarePair, LinkPotential>::forceOverR(double rsq, int i, int j) const
00300    {
00301         double total = pair_.forceOverR(rsq, i, j);
00302         if (rsq < maxLinkLengthSq_) {
00303            total -= activity_ * exp(-beta_ * link_.energy(rsq, 0)) * link_.forceOverR(rsq, 0);
00304         }
00305         return total;
00306    }
00307 
00308    /*
00309    * Modify a parameter, identified by a string.
00310    */
00311    template <class BarePair, class LinkPotential>
00312    void CompensatedPair<BarePair, LinkPotential>
00313         ::set(std::string name, int i, int j, double value)
00314    {
00315       if (name == "epsilon") {
00316          pair_.setEpsilon(i, j, value);
00317       } else {
00318          UTIL_THROW("Unrecognized parameter name");
00319       }
00320    }
00321 
00322    /*
00323    * Get a parameter value, identified by a string.
00324    */
00325    template <class BarePair, class LinkPotential>
00326    double CompensatedPair<BarePair, LinkPotential>
00327           ::get(std::string name, int i, int j) const
00328    {
00329       double value;
00330       if (name == "epsilon") {
00331          value = pair_.epsilon(i, j);
00332       } else {
00333          UTIL_THROW("Unrecognized parameter name");
00334       }
00335       return value;
00336    }
00337 
00338    /* 
00339    * Return the class name.
00340    */
00341    template <class BarePair, class LinkPotential>
00342    std::string CompensatedPair<BarePair, LinkPotential>::className() const
00343    {  return className_; }
